content.raw: Also we might want to add an option to let you drop a row before or after preconditioning, since it seems like you have to do it before to get good results with Laguerre \(this sort of makes sense – doing it after is adding a tau term like generalized laguerre L^\(1\)\_\(N-1\), which projects against all L\_n equally…
content.html: Also we might want to add an option to let you drop a row before or after preconditioning, since it seems like you have to do it before to get good results with Laguerre (this sort of makes sense – doing it after is adding a tau term like generalized laguerre L^(1)_(N-1), which projects against all L_n equally…
